text: Antirhea tomentosa is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Jamaica. It is threatened by habitat loss. The species was first discovered in 1780 and rediscovered in 1975, making it a Lazarus taxon. ==References== * tom Category:Endemic flora of Jamaica Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Antirhea tomentosa
